resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Select the team from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "groupId" parameter in the URL you get from "Get a link to the team")

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Microsoft Teams URL
Not a valid Microsoft Teams Team ID

teamId.ai_hint: Select the team from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "groupId" parameter in the URL you get from "Get a link to the team")

options.name: options
assignedTo

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Microsoft Teams Team ID

options.description: Who the task should be assigned to

options.name: dueDateTime
options.description: Date and time at which the task is due. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.

options.name: percentComplete
options.description: Percentage of task completion. When set to 100, the task is considered completed.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Select the channel from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "threadId" in the URL)
channelId.ai_hint: Select the channel from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "threadId" in the URL)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

contentType.name: contentType
contentType.description: Whether the message is plain text or HTML
contentType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

chatId.name: chatId
chatId.description: Select the chat from the list, by URL, or by ID (find the chat ID after "conversations/" in the URL)
chatId.ai_hint: Select the chat from the list, by URL, or by ID (find the chat ID after "conversations/" in the URL)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: The ID of the message to retrieve
messageId.ai_hint: The ID of the message to retrieve

responseType.name: responseType

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

responseType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

formFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Microsoft Teams Team ID

planId.description: The plan for the task to belong to
planId.ai_hint: The plan for the task to belong to

bucketId.name: bucketId
bucketId.description: The bucket for the task to belong to
bucketId.ai_hint: The bucket for the task to belong to

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: The ID of the task to update
taskId.ai_hint: The ID of the task to update

tasksFor.name: tasksFor
tasksFor.description: Whether to retrieve the tasks for a user or for a plan
tasksFor.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: assignedTo

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Microsoft Teams Team ID

options.description: Who the task should be assigned to

options.name: bucketId
options.description: The bucket for the task to belong to

options.name: dueDateTime
options.description: Date and time at which the task is due. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Microsoft Teams Team ID

options.name: percentComplete
options.description: Percentage of task completion. When set to 100, the task is considered completed.

options.name: planId
options.description: The plan for the task to belong to

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'deleteChannel' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'deleteChannel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contentType'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'teamId'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'channelMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contentType'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'responseType'
IF responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'defineForm'
IF defineForm == 'json' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF defineForm == 'fields' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'formFields'
IF fieldType IN ["hiddenField", "html"] THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldLabel'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldName'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementName'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "date", "file", "html", "hiddenField", "radio", "checkbox"] THEN HIDE parameter 'placeholder'
IF fieldType IN ["text", "number", "email", "textarea"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "radio"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'radio' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF multiselect == True AND fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselectLegacyNotice'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselect'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'limitSelection'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'exact' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberOfSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'minSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxSelections'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'multipleFiles'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'acceptFileTypes'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'formatDate'
IF fieldType IN ["html", "hiddenField"] THEN HIDE parameter 'requiredField'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'approvalOptions'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'approveLabel'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'disapproveLabel'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeAmount'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeUnit'
IF limitType == 'atSpecifiedTime' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxDateAndTime'
IF responseType IN ["freeText", "customForm"] AND resource == 'chatMessage' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'planId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'bucketId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'deleteTask' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'tasksFor'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF tasksFor == 'plan' AND resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'planId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
